title: International Wild Card Starts in 5 minutes
body:
Welcome to the Wild Card Invitational where no one knows the teams and we can only hope for the best in ways of entertainment!

First up is: 
CHF (The Chiefs eSports Club) [From Australia]
vs
KLG (Kaos Latin Gamers) [From Chile]

Followed by:

HR (Hard Random) [Ukrainian team]
vs	
Det FM (DetonatioN FocusMe) [Japanese team]

Anyone else watching?

**EDIT for Accuracy**

Correction (Game 2 Starts soon Not game which is over and CHF won) **O.O oh my**

replies.body:
For those not watching,

First game was won by CHF
Second game was won by HR

Third Game in progress.
